Text.val: if its an archived document ... lookup the information from ARCH
if DUNH record has a journal number ... lookup additional information in REPA
set to true if user is allowed to see debtor information
for the one which is specified in DUNH record ...
set to trie if user is allowed to look into the socument ....
url from where we can download Tamino documents (journaled documents)
1:=Remark (Note), 2:=Tamino, 3:=Radiant
complete pathname to downloaded document on disk ...
URL to this file from outside world (internet) -> requesteddocuments
return/error values from Radiant in case document is retrieved from archive serv
temporary file for telephone notes ...
error codes / text if there's an error. Will be displayed to client user ...
general settings ....
local variables ...
Originally copy of: ICA302B --> ViewDunningAction
check if valid session ....
Check if debtor is allowed ...
decide what to show if user clicked dunh record ...
disable display of MSG documents which cannot be displayed ...
download document from Tamino ...
We need to decide from where a document should be loaded
(and then getting displayed) since there's different types and sources
The event will set v.DocumentSource from above task to:
1 := Tamino document exists (and needs to get displayed)
2 := Radiant document exists (and needs to get displayed)
3 := Telephone note
Note that DUNH allows to specify more than one document source since
there's remarks AND (possibly) Tamino and Rafdiant document. Credman will
will display all these information, ICA302B NOT.
Further Note: Unlike Credman we do only display Notes (Remarks) if they are
covered by the requirements from the specification. So: Its checked in advance
if its a telephone note which can be displayed. This heuristic
is only then relevant if there's no note.
//error occurred
user is allowed to see documents of that client .....
do we display dunnig letters (REPA) or dunning actions (DUNH)
switch display of DUNH ON/OFF

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DH.DUNH_ID, DH.DUNH_DEBC_NO, DH.DUNH_DATE, DH.DUNH_ACTION, DH.DUNH_RECIPIENT, DH.DUNH_HYPA_ID, DH.DUNH_HYPA_DEPARTMENTNAME, DH.DUNH_REPA_JOURNALNO, 0 ARCH_DOCTYPE FROM :1/dunh dh left outer join :2/duld dd on dh.dunh_action=dd.duld_letter left outer join :3/hydt hy on dh.dunh_doctype=hy.HYDT_DOCTYPE WHERE DUNH_DEBC_NO=:4 AND DUNH_DATE>':5' AND ((DH.DUNH_REPA_JOURNALNO>0 AND DD.DULD_DISPLAYONDUNNINGHISORYWEB='Y') OR (DUNH_DOCTYPE > 0 and HYDT_DISPLAYINDUNNINGHISTWEB = 'Y') OR (DUNH_ACTION='TEL' and DUNH_REMARKPRESENT='Y' and (DUNH_RECIPIENT=1 or DUNH_RECIPIENT=2)))
